A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Occasionally\, all of us need to escape into a film that will allow us to travel on a journey to far away worlds with heroes and villains\, asking us to choose between good and evil\, and adopting creatures of pure fantasy. There are certain times that going to a movie should be just about the adventure\, the ride\, and hanging out with friends\, old and new. \nThat's what I found in Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
